routes.title: @alpha
routes.description: Alpha validation decorator will allow only alphabets to be entered.

routes.title: @alphaNumeric
routes.description: Alpha Numeric validation decorator will allow only alphabets and numbers to be entered.

routes.title: @ascii
routes.description: Ascii validation decorator allows user to enter the input which is in the proper ascii format

routes.title: @compare
routes.description: Compare validation decorator will compare two inputs.

routes.title: @contains
routes.description: Contains validation decorator will check that value is in the input.

routes.title: @creditCard
routes.description: CreditCard validation decorator will check property value is creditcardtype or not.

routes.title: @dataUri
routes.description: DataUri validation decorator allows user to enter the input which is in the proper data URI format.

routes.title: @different
routes.description: different validation decorator will check whether two value if they are different it will be valid

routes.title: @digit
routes.description: Digit validation decorator will allow only digits to be entered.

routes.title: @email
routes.description: Email validation decorator will allow only emails to be entered.

routes.title: @endsWith
routes.description: EndsWith validation decorator allows user to enter the input which ends with perticular value

routes.title: @even
routes.description: Even validation decorator will check whether the value entered is a Even or not.

routes.title: @factor
routes.description: factor validation decorator will check whether the value entered is factor of the particular value.

routes.title: @fileSize
routes.description: FileSize validation decorator allows user to enter the input which is in the proper fileSize format.

routes.title: @greaterThanEqualTo
routes.description: Greater than equal to validation decorator will check that input property is greater than equal to value.

routes.title: @greaterThan
routes.description: Greater than validation decorator will check that input property is greater than related field input.

routes.title: @hexColor
routes.description: HexColor validation decorator will allow only Hex Color to be entered.

routes.title: @json
routes.description: json validation decorator will allow only Json to be entered.

routes.title: @latitude
routes.description: Latitude validation decorator allows user to enter the input which is in the proper latitude format.

routes.title: @latLong
routes.description: LatLong validation decorator allows user to enter the input which is in the proper Latitude or longitude

routes.title: @leapYear
routes.description: LeapYear validation decorator will check whether the value entered is a leap year or not.

routes.title: @lessThanEqualTo
routes.description: Less than equal to validation decorator will check that input property is less than equal to value.

routes.title: @lessThan
routes.description: Less than validation decorator will check that input property is less than value.

routes.title: @longitude
routes.description: Longitude validation decorator allows user to enter the input which is in the proper longitude format.

routes.title: @lowerCase
routes.description: lowerCase validation decorator will allow only lowercase to be entered.

routes.title: @mac
routes.description: mac validation decorator will check whether the value entered is in proper format of mac address.

routes.title: @maxDate
routes.description: MaxDate validation decorator will allow only maximum date be entered upto value parameter.

routes.title: @maxLength
routes.description: MaxLength validation decorator will allow only maximum length be entered upto value parameter.

routes.title: @maxNumber
routes.description: MaxNumber validation decorator will allow only maximum number be entered upto value parameter.

routes.title: @minDate
routes.description: Minimum Date validation decorator will allow only minimum date be entered upto value parameter.

routes.title: @minLength
routes.description: MinLength validation decorator will allow only minimum length be entered upto value parameter.

routes.title: @minNumber
routes.description: MinNumber validation decorator will allow only minimum number be entered upto value parameter.

routes.title: @numeric
routes.description: numeric validation decorator will check whether the value entered is a valid number or not.

routes.title: @odd
routes.description: Odd validation decorator will check whether the value entered is a odd or not.

routes.title: @oneOf
routes.description: Odd validation decorator will check whether the user has entered any one of the given inputs or not.

routes.title: @password
routes.description: Password validation decorator will allow only password pattern according for PasswordValidation parameters to be entered.

routes.title: @pattern
routes.description: Pattern validation decorator will allow only match input as pattern to be entered.

routes.title: @port
routes.description: Port validation decorator allows user to enter the input which is in the proper port format.

routes.title: @primeNumber
routes.description: PrimeNumber validation decorator allows user to enter only the prime number.

routes.title: @range
routes.description: Range validation decorator will allow only in specify range will be entered.

routes.title: @required
routes.description: Required validation decorator will check that value is entered or not in the property.

routes.title: @startsWith
routes.description: StartsWith validation decorator allows user to enter the input which starts with perticular value

routes.title: @time
routes.description: Time validation decorator will allow only time format to be entered.

routes.title: @upperCase
routes.description: Upper Case validation decorator will allow only uppercase to be entered.

routes.title: @url
routes.description: Url validation decorator will check that value is url or not in the property.
